literals.CompareCaption: Shows your average score in a unit compared to everyone

literals.NoProgress: A progress report is not available with Just practice. If you would like to check your progress, please create an account on the sign-in page.
literals.DisconnectedTimeoutReset: You have been disconnected from the internet for too long and have been automatically signed out.
literals.LicenceInvalidReset: Your licence has been dropped and you have been signed out. Please try again.
literals.InactivityTimeoutReset: You have been inactive for too long and have been automatically signed out.
